title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
description: When trying to create a new class using the new class wizard, the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank even when a .java file is open in the editor. The 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the current type in the editor.
OB: The 'Enclosing Type' field is blank when creating a new class using the new class wizard, even when a .java file is open in the editor.
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the current type in the editor when creating a new class using the new class wizard.
SR: Ensure that the 'Enclosing Type' field is populated with the current type in the editor by default when creating a new class using the new class wizard.
